--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Colin Green <cgreen@d...> wrote:

> Ahh shucks, well it's very kind of you to say so. Yeh I have toyed 
with 
> the idea of going back to university, I guess I'd need to do an 
MSc or 
> something before a Phd - and it just so happens there is a decent 
course 
> practically on my doorstep at Birmingham. Perhaps I'll look into 
it a 
> bit further, check out the implications, etc. Trouble is you see 
the IT 
> job market is pretty buoyant in the UK so there's [potentially] 
quite a 
> few opportunities there also. hmm.
> 

Colin, when you say there are opportunities in the UK job market,
are you thinking just in terms of jobs in general or do you mean 
possibly using NEAT in a real application?  What do you currently do 
for a living?

ken
